snippet: The Christmas Day fire that killed five people in Stamford, Conn., has sent many homeowners scrambling to check their own safety equipment.
abstract: Many homeowners are checking their own fire safety equipment and reconsidering their safeguards after five people died in a Christmas Day fire in Stamford, Conn, as a result of improperly discarded fireplace embers.
lead_paragraph: The Christmas Day fire that killed five people in Stamford, Conn., has sent many homeowners scrambling to check their own safety equipment.

headline.seo: After a Stamford Fire, a Focus on Safety in Homes
headline.main: A Cold Lesson in Fire Safety
